message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $9,000?

Bob, I understand you're on a tight budget, but $9,000 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. That's still a good deal for you, considering the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested in this price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. Can you consider this price?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,500 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you at $11,500. That's a fair compromise, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement. Let me know what you think.
I'm getting close to accepting, but $11,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $11,000, but I'm not going any lower than that. Can you consider this price?
